attributes.action: Overseas Aid only spendable in the UK. Only send things abroad not cash.
attributes.additional_details: By publishing where aid is given and in what form, the people of the UK, whose money is at present being woefully inadequately spent, can see, online, just where their money is going
attributes.background: Aid is desperately needed by the poor and disadvantaged of the world. Aid that is given by us but often never reaches the people who need it. This petition provides an answer to that problem
